DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim enroll 2000 patient undergo diagnostic hysteroscopy suspect uterine pathology . Women randomize two group basis distension medium : group A CO2 ; group B physiological solution . Pain discomfort evaluate examination .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Between Two Different Distention Medium Diagnostic Hysteroscopy
DOC.criteria: suspect uterine pathology infertility pregnancy severe hypertension , cardiovascular disease respiratory disease
